member.name: T:Windows.Media.MediaControl
member.summary: Describes the object that applications register with, to receive media focus and transport control notifications.
member.deprecated: MediaControl may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 8.1. Instead, use SystemMediaTransportControls.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.MediaControl.AlbumArt
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the artwork for the album cover.
member.returns: Path to the artwork for the album cover.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.MediaControl.ArtistName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the artist.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.MediaControl.IsPlaying
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the Play button.
member.returns: The state of the Play button.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.MediaControl.TrackName
member.summary: Gets or sets the track name.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.ChannelDownPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **ChannelDown** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.ChannelUpPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **ChannelUp** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.FastForwardPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **FastForward** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.NextTrackPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **NextTrack** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.PausePressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **Pause** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.PlayPauseTogglePressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **PlayPauseToggle** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.PlayPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **Play** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.PreviousTrackPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **PreviousTrack** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.RecordPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **Record** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.RewindPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **Rewind** command is issued to the application.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.SoundLevelChanged
member.summary: Event raised when the sound level changes.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.MediaControl.StopPressed
member.summary: Event raised when a **Stop** command is issued to the application.
